Text:
thank you for this last sharpe we will enjoy it much.
And also thank you for the other ones .
Just like Sharpe you are a hero - my joy knows no bounds!

Thanks for this Sharp.  You are the SHARPest guy I know.

I wish your subtitles were in a an external stream, or even an internal one, but they are all HARD wired in and cannot be removed, pity.
thank you very much, great sharing !
Thanks to the very geberous seeder who allowed me to get this and the other Sharpe episodes yesterday and today. Huzzay to you and Sharpe!
